ModMetaData.name: Royalty Patch for [MUS]Gothicstyle Vampire Furniture
ModMetaData.author: nekomaster93
ModMetaData.description: Royalty Patch for '[MUS]Gothicstyle Vampire Furniture', making mod furniture compatible with bedroom and throneroom requirements from 'Royalty' DLC (and 'Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire' mod optionally). 为"[MUS]哥特式吸血鬼家具"添加了皇权内容适配，使mod内的家具能够满足贵族头衔的卧室与谒见厅需求，支持"皇权"DLC(以及"原版势力拓展-帝国"mod)。

li.displayName: [MUS]哥特式吸血鬼家具 Gothicstyle Vampire Furniture
